com.jgaap.gui.dnd
Class CanonicizerLabelPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.jgaap.gui.dnd.CanonicizerLabelPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanonicizerLabelUnpackager, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class CanonicizerLabelPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements CanonicizerLabelUnpackager

This class handles a set of embedded CanonicizerLabel instances. These instances can be moved or copied out of the panel. The panel is also a possible drop location for CanonicizerPacket instances carrying new CanonicizerLabels to place on this panel. A CanonicizerLabelPanel needs to know where it is in the GUI (Location) and what ActionGroup it affects (single document, set of documents, all documents).

Author:
Chuck Liddell
See Also:
Serialized Form

CanonicizerLabelPanel

public CanonicizerLabelPanel(DnDManager dndManager,
                             CanonicizerLabelPanel.ActionGroup actionGroup,
                             boolean dropTarget)
Constructor that accepts Location and ActionGroup to define the attributes of this panel, and also takes a transferhandler to handle drop events on this panel.

Parameters:
dndManager - DnDManager instance that we will pass drag / drop results to
actionGroup - The set of documents this panel represents
dropTarget - Indicates whether this panel can have labels dropped on it
